Weber Syndrome: I've been having double vision for the past 2 days
My left eyelid has been drooping
My left eye seems to be looking down and out
My left pupil looks bigger than my right
I've noticed weakness on my right side - my right arm and leg feel heavy
I can't lift my right arm as well as before
My right leg drags when I walk
The weakness came on suddenly yesterday morning
I have a history of hypertension and diabetes
I might have some difficulty with fine motor tasks on my right hand
Wallenberg Syndrome: I've been having severe dizziness and vertigo since yesterday
The room feels like it's spinning
I have numbness on the left side of my face
My left eye feels smaller and the eyelid is drooping slightly
I'm having trouble swallowing - food gets stuck
I feel unsteady when I walk, like I'm going to fall to the left
The right side of my body feels numb to pain and temperature
I can feel touch on my right side but not hot or cold
I might have some hiccups that won't stop
I might notice decreased sweating on the left side of my face
Millard-Gubler Syndrome: I can't move my left eye to the left side
I have double vision when looking to the left
The left side of my face is weak - I can't close my left eye completely
My smile is crooked, drooping on the left
My right arm and leg are weak
I'm having trouble walking because my right leg is weak
The weakness on my right side came on suddenly this morning
Food dribbles out of the left side of my mouth
I have high blood pressure that's been poorly controlled
I might have some slurred speech
Lateral Pontine Syndrome: I've lost hearing in my left ear suddenly
I have severe dizziness and the room is spinning
The left side of my face is completely numb
I can't close my left eye and my left face is drooping
I'm very unsteady when I walk and tend to fall to the left
I have ringing in my left ear (tinnitus)
The right side of my body feels numb to pinprick and temperature
I can't feel hot or cold on my right arm and leg
I feel nauseated and have vomited twice
I might have some jerking eye movements (nystagmus)
Medial Medullary Syndrome: My tongue deviates to the left when I stick it out
I have weakness on my right side - arm and leg
My right arm and leg feel clumsy and weak
I've lost the sense of position in my right arm and leg
I can't tell where my right hand is without looking at it
I have trouble feeling vibration on my right side
The weakness came on suddenly yesterday
I have difficulty with coordination on my right side
I tend to fall when I close my eyes (positive Romberg)
I might have some difficulty with speech articulation
Midbrain Stroke: I have double vision that started suddenly
My right pupil is dilated and doesn't react to light
My right eye is looking down and out
I have weakness on my left side
My left arm and leg feel heavy and weak
I might have a tremor in my left hand
I have difficulty with coordination on my left side
I have a history of atrial fibrillation
I might have some visual problems or hallucinations
Multiple Sclerosis Brainstem: I've been having episodes of double vision that come and go
Sometimes my left eye doesn't move properly
I have numbness on the right side of my face
I've had episodes of vertigo in the past
I have weakness in my right leg that's been progressive
I feel electric shock sensations down my spine when I bend my neck (Lhermitte's sign)
I've had bladder problems - urgency and frequency
My vision was blurry in one eye a few months ago but got better
I might have some fatigue that gets worse with heat
Basilar Artery Thrombosis: I have severe dizziness and vertigo
I'm seeing double - everything appears twice
I have weakness in all four limbs - arms and legs
I'm having trouble speaking clearly - my speech is slurred
I feel very unsteady and can't walk without support
I have numbness on both sides of my face
My vision is blurry or I'm seeing things
I feel very drowsy and confused
I might have a severe headache at the back of my head
I might have lost consciousness briefly
